content: ग्रंथिः {@--1@} A knot, bunch, protuberance in general; स्तनौ मांसग्रंथी कनककलशावित्युपमितौ <ls>Bh. 3. 20</ls>; so मेदोग्रंथि. {@--2@} A tie or knot of a cord, garment &c.; इदमुपहितसूक्ष्मग्रंथिना स्कंधदेशे <ls>Ś. 1. 18</ls>; <ls>Mk. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 43</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 57.</ls> {@--3@} A knot tied in the end of a garment for keeping money; hence, purse, money, property; कुसीदाद् दारिद्र्यं परकरगतग्रंथिशमनात् <ls>Pt. 1. 11.</ls> {@--4@} The joint or knot of a reed, cane &c. {@--5@} A joint of the body. {@--6@} Crookedness, distortion, falsehood, perversion of truth. {@--7@} Swelling and hardening of the vessels of the body.
